item.title: I’m a CPA. I found out that an executive assistant makes $10K more than me. Can I use this to get a raise?
Should you pay someone to do your taxes? Answer these 3 questions first.
item.description: You can file your tax return starting Monday, Jan. 26. This is the first tax season with Trump’s big new tax law on the books.

item.description: Rio Tinto has until Feb. 5 to inform the U.K. Takeover Panel if it intends to make an offer for Glencore.
